title: What compels a parent to beat their own flesh and blood?
body: If you conceive a child you're supposed to do all you can to raise them to be a fruitful denizen of the human race. Beating them, as someone they trust by default, hurts them. You're supposed to love them. Why would you attack someone you love? Would you attack one of your peers? If you wouldn't, then why attack your own flesh and blood? Why attack someone who is innocent and small?
